thread.title: The Shops at Stonefield To Host Field Fest On October 24, 2015
thread.title_full: The Shops at Stonefield To Host Field Fest On October 24, 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: The Shops at Stonefield To Host Field Fest On October 24, 2015
text:
EDENS
Festival will spotlight outdoor concert headlined by The Brian Patrick Band, a beer garden presented by WNRN radio, and food from Stonefield restaurants
CHARLOTTESVILLE, Va. , Oct. 8, The Shops at Stonefield will host the second annual Field Fest on October 24 from 2-6 p.m. The event will take place on the Green with live music, a beer garden sponsored by local radio station WNRN, and food from Stonefield's acclaimed restaurants.
The Brian Patrick Band, an original roots rock/alt-country rock band from central Virginia , will perform two one-hour sets during the concert. The five-member band's repertoire spans multiple genres, featuring talented songwriting and an engaging live act.
WNRN, Charlottesville's independent radio station, will present a beer garden on the Green during the event. WNRN, staffed by experts in the local music scene, is a leading non-profit organization, funded through listener and underwriting support. 50 percent of the beer garden's profits will benefit Big Brothers Big Sisters of Blue Ridge .
Restaurant partners including Travinia Italian Kitchen, Rocksalt Charlottesville and Capital Teas will provide the flavors of Field Fest, selling the greatest hits from their menu at the concert.
Admission is free; the beer garden and food will require purchase.
About The Shops at Stonefield
The Shops at Stonefield features a curated mix of local fashion boutiques, businesses and restaurants with premier national retailers and Regal Cinemas. For more information about The Shops at Stonefield, please visit www.shopsatstonefield.com .
About WNRN
WNRN is an independent, non-commercial radio station based in Charlottesville, Virginia that serves much of state on repeater signals and the world at WNRN.org, with a focus on music discovery and community involvement. WNRN is supported by its listeners.
